Welcome to Notifications!

To get started, open the console and create an instance of the Notifications class.

const myNotif = new Notifications();

Optionally configure with options:


const myNotif = new Notifications({
  classRemoving : 'notification--removing',
  classVisible  : 'notification--visible',
  delayFadeIn   : 2000,
  delayFadeOut  : 1000,
  id            : 'notification-container'
});

Once instantiated, create a notification using the render() method

myNotif.render('My notification text!');
